title.narrative: BSWE Production of Plastic Pavement Stones and Toilet Slabs

description.narrative: Sector Environment. Recycling of Plastic and Rubber Waste. (Self-help Grant).Beneficiaries: 71 members, of which 45 are women.This small grant production of plastic pavement stones and toilet slabs will help members to earn increased income. USADF funds will help 71 members to purchase tools and equipment ( e.g., steel plate tables, wheel barrow, tricycle, hand gloves, googles); construction materials (steel plate for chimney, pipes, corrugated iron zinc, metal doors and windows, wire mesh, ceiling hard boards etc.); training (e.g., training materials).
